1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall -fno-warn-orphans #-}
2
3-- | Relkit constructors.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit.Construct
6  ( -- * General constructor
7    relkit, relkitId,
8    relkitJust, relkitNothing,
9    relkitSetSource,
10
11    -- * Source of relation
12    relkitConst, relkitConstEmpty,
13    relkitConstSingleton, relkitConstBody,
14    relkitSource,
15
16    -- * Relation reference
17    relkitCopy, relkitNest, relkitNestVar,
18  ) where
19
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture            as O
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax              as S
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                as D
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit.Relkit  as C
25
26
27-- ----------------------  General constructor
28
29-- | Construct relkit with output heading
30--   and relation-to-relation calculation.
31relkit :: Maybe D.Head -> C.RelkitCore c -> C.Relkit c
32relkit ho = C.Relkit Nothing ho . B.Sourced []
33
34-- | Relkit for identity relmap.
35relkitId :: Maybe D.Head -> C.Relkit c
36relkitId ho = relkit ho C.RelkitId
37
38-- | Determinated relkit.
39relkitJust :: D.Head -> C.RelkitCore c -> C.Relkit c
40relkitJust ho = relkit $ Just ho
41
42-- | Indeterminated relkit.
43relkitNothing :: C.Relkit c
44relkitNothing = relkit Nothing C.RelkitId
45
46-- | Set relkit source.
47relkitSetSource :: (B.CodePtr a) => a -> O.Map (C.Relkit c)
48relkitSetSource src (C.Relkit hi ho (B.Sourced _ core)) =
49    C.Relkit hi ho $ B.Sourced (B.codePtList src) core
50
51instance Monoid (C.Relkit c) where
52    mempty = relkitConst D.reldee
53    mappend (C.Relkit _ _ bo1) (C.Relkit _ ho2 bo2) =
54        relkit ho2 $ C.RelkitAppend bo1 bo2
55
56
57-- ----------------------  Source of relation
58
59-- | Relkit for constant relmap.
60relkitConst :: D.Rel c -> C.Relkit c
61relkitConst (D.Rel he bo) = relkitJust he $ C.RelkitConst bo
62
63-- | Relkit for relmap which output empty relation.
64relkitConstEmpty :: [S.TermName] -> C.Relkit c
65relkitConstEmpty ns = relkitConstBody ns []
66
67-- | Relkit for relmap which outputs singleton relation.
68relkitConstSingleton :: [S.TermName] -> [c] -> C.Relkit c
69relkitConstSingleton ns tuple = relkitConstBody ns [tuple]
70
71-- | Relkit for constant relmap.
72relkitConstBody :: [S.TermName] -> [[c]] -> C.Relkit c
73relkitConstBody ns bo = kit where
74    he  = D.headFrom ns
75    kit = relkitJust he $ C.RelkitConst bo
76
77-- | Relkit for source relmap.
78relkitSource :: D.JudgeClass -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relkit c
79relkitSource p ns = relkitJust he kit where
80    he  = D.headFrom ns
81    kit = C.RelkitSource p ns
82
83
84-- ----------------------  Relation reference
85
86-- | Relkit for copy relmap.
87relkitCopy :: S.Token -> String -> O.Map (C.Relkit c)
88relkitCopy p n (C.Relkit _ ho kitb) = relkit ho $ C.RelkitCopy p n kitb
89
90-- | Relkit for self-group relmap.
91relkitNest :: S.Token -> [(String, Int)] -> O.Map (C.Relkit c)
92relkitNest p nest (C.Relkit _ ho kitb) = relkit ho $ C.RelkitNest p nest kitb
93
94-- | Relkit for local relation reference.
95relkitNestVar :: S.Token -> String -> D.Head -> C.Relkit c
96relkitNestVar p n he = relkitJust he $ C.RelkitNestVar p n
97
